MonsterTrait.Name: Angelic Weapons
MonsterTrait.Text: The planetar’s weapon attacks are magical. When the planetar hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 5d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

MonsterTrait.Name: Divine Awareness
MonsterTrait.Text: The planetar knows if it hears a lie.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The planetar’s spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20). The planetar can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: detect evil and good, invisibility (self only) 3/day each: blade barrier, dispel evil and good, flame strike, raise dead 1/day each: commune, control weather, insect plague

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The planetar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The planetar makes two melee attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Greatsword
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d6 + 7) slashing damage plus 22 (5d8) radiant damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Healing Touch (4/Day)
MonsterTrait.Text: The planetar touches another creature. The target magically regains 30 (6d8 + 3) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.
